reviews.review: pretty fun
Blue Shift is great fun

[h1] Half-Life: Blue Shift- An Underwhelming Expansion[/h1]
[b]Introduction to Blue Shift[/b]
Half-Life: Blue Shift is a 2001 expansion for Half-Life. It is the second expansion to be released for the main game, with Opposing Force coming 2 years before. Blue Shift stars Barney Calhoun as the protagonist, offering yet another perspective during the events of Half-Life, but from a security guards' eyes. The story takes Barney throughout alien-infested facilities as he fights off both aliens and the military on his quest to escape the Black Mesa Research Facility.

[b]Blue Shift- An expansion with little new to offer[/b]
There isn't anything new in this expansion besides the new maps to traverse and Barney's adventure, which is a shame since Opposing Force introduced plenty of new features that added a lot to that game. There's no unique weapons or enemies to be found in this game. [spoiler]There's not even a final boss (or "bosses" in general), which makes for an anticlimactic finale.[/spoiler]
That's not all, either. Blue Shift is only around 3 hours long! That's even shorter than Opposing Force's campaign, which was about 5 hours long. 
The experience wasn't bad, though. I found myself enjoying Blue Shift's story, I liked the references to Half-Life and Opposing Force, and I had fun playing through the game as Barney.

[b]Rating: A shift with little impact[/b]
I'd give this game a 6/10. Blue Shift has a campaign that's worth returning to the world of Half-Life for, but it doesn't add as much as Opposing Force did, making Blue Shift the weaker Half-Life expansion.
listen, the only reason I have this many hours in this game is cuz I left it open over a weekend by accident.
Bit short compared to Opposing Force, but is still a must-play for Half-Life fans as Big Barney kicks arse (No wonder he was brought back for Half-Life 2).

Así como Opposing Force, Blue Shift no aporta nada sustancial a la trama. Son sólo situaciones encadenadas de Half-Life desde la pespectiva del guardia que te ayuda a abrir las puertas en el primer juego de la saga. Tampoco hay nada novedoso, ni mejores texturas, ni jugabilidad, ni gráficos, nada. Podés jugar Half-Life 2 sin necesidad de este ni de Opposing Force.
No es mal juego pero no convence el nulo aporte a la trama. Podés ver durante unos segundos a Freeman en un par de situaciones pero no podés interactuar ni acercarte. Lo tenés lejos siempre.

Out of the original Half-Life and its expansions i liked this one the least. It's not bad but Opposing Force is the best imo and the original Half-Life is the golden middle while Blue Shift is just basic. Fun but basic compared to the rest of the games.

[h1] Небольшая история о побеге Барни [/h1]

Half life: blue shift - это небольшая история о том, как охранник Барни смог сбежать из комплекса Черной Месы во время катастрофы. Говорить тут особо нечего на самом деле. Как мы узнаем Барни был раньше Фримена в КСЕНе и в целом по его действиям он ничем не уступает Гордону. Нам так же покажут некоторые фрагменты, которые позволят взглянуть на моменты первой части под другим углом.

Не могу сказать, что это длс прям маст хев, но если вам интересно или вы купили комплит, то советую.

Se avete apprezzato l'uno, apprezzerete anche l'altro, tenendo però in considerazione che Blue Shift manca di originalità rispetto al primo. La brevità fa sì che non venga a noia.

[h1] Оценка: 7/10
Нравится: геймплей, арт-дизайн, сюжет, анимация, саундтрек, звуковые эффекты.

バニラやOpposingForceと比べると武器や敵の新奇さではやや新鮮味に欠けるうえ短めの内容とはいえ、しっかりとHalf-Lifeなので充分楽しめる良コンテンツ

でもねー、なんか真っ暗なんだよね
設定で明るさを変えようとしてもバグのためにまったく反映されず初期設定が異常に暗いこともあり全ステージ中かなりのシーンでフラッシュライトがないとゲームにならない始末
フラッシュライトに頼って暗闇の中をウロウロして曲がり角や交差点にに差し掛かるたびにヘッドハガーが飛びついてくるのはまさに悪夢
調べてみたところ解決方法が分かったので備忘録代わりにここに書いておくことにするよ

Half-Lifeフォルダに

brightness "2"
gamma "4"
texgamma "2"
lightgamma "2"

という内容でuserconfig.cfgという名称のファイルを作って入れる
これで暗闇地獄から開放されて普通に楽しめるようになる

もうひとつ、このゲームには選択を誤ると進行不能になるポイントがある
一度正解でない方の道を選ぶと戻れなくなって詰む
わりと序盤、下水の管理施設みたいなところでまず右に向かって、その先にあるリフトのスイッチを入れておかないと詰む
リフトのスイッチで行き止まりになっているのでさっきの分岐に戻って改めて左の道に行く段取り
上記のポイントを通っていないのにいきなり二体のゾンビにガードマンが落とされるイベントに遭遇したらもうすでに詰んでいる
こういうねー、初見で間違うと戻れなくなってだいぶ前の自動セーブからやり直さなければならないようなことは勘弁してほしいんだよね

でもいろいろと新しいアイデアや見せ場が用意されているのでバニラが好きな人は絶対楽しめるので熱烈に推奨
おもしろいよ

Você absolutamente precisa jogar Blue Shift? Não - o fato é, você não ta perdendo nada. É uma expansão curta, planejada pro porte do dreamcast, assim como Half-Life: Decay foi uma expansão pro porte de ps2. Agora, definitivamente não é ruim. O problema é que você teria muito mais retorno de HL e HL:OP4. 

Se você realmente insiste em jogar, por outro lado, seu eu-futuro agradeceria se você esperasse uma promoção.

Shorter than Opposing Force, but has more story content. Its as fun as the previous ones, but the level design here is a bit abstract. Still, it is yet another phenomenal experience and very fun to play. Recommended.
